meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive John Giambrone Marcy Lehman Sean Udicious Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7693.

td.p: John Giambrone, an investment banking analyst from New York, New York
Marcy Lehman, a senior business systems analyst from Marion, Iowa
Sean Udicious, an expeditor from Cherry Hill, New Jersey (whose 2-day cash winnings total $30,799)

tr.td: (Alex: All of the clues will be delivered by the stars of Shark Tank.)
1968 IN AMERICAN HISTORY
VOCABULARY
THE STATEN ISLAND FERRY IN POP CULTURE
AUTHORS' FICTIONAL PLACES
"SECURITY"

$9,701
blue, white, and orange')

They're the 3 colors of New York City's flag & of the Knicks & Mets teams; 2 are on the Dutch flag & 1 used to be

Marcy
John

New champion: $19,601

Marcy
John

(including 1 DD)

(including 2 DDs),

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
